title: About
text: As an earth system scientist and ecologist I model ecosystem processes. For more information on my scientific work I refer to BlueGreen Labs. Here you will find some observations on work, life, and academia.

title: Fresh start
text:
The old framework of my blog was getting stale, so I’ll refresh it to quarto. I’m unsure if all posts will be ported over but I’ll try to keep the best of them.
Time for writing extensively is limited these days, so I consider the fresh design a placeholder mostly. I hope this might change in the near future.
